content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the utena district court the court has made a final resolution regarding the division of matrimonial property between the parties involved the property includes land and a building and the court has decided to divide it equally the defendant is responsible for any debts related to the dissolution of the marriage the applicant is seeking a divorce and division of the matrimonial property as well as repayment of debts and legal costs the court has upheld the application and dissolved the marriage without fault on either party the property was divided equally and both parties are obligated to fulfill their obligations towards a creditor the court has ordered fines to be paid by one party to the state tax inspectorate and the defendant has been ordered to pay the applicants legal costs the state budget will also recover postage costs related to serving procedural documents
